description:
**WINNER OF THE HP WEBOS DEVELOPER APP HACK COMPETITION**

New Update!
- Complete Redesign
- Bug fixes
- New Statistics View!
- New updated Fruit Skins (+ Choice of two skins!)
- Added setting to change music/sfx volume independently
- Changed the game slightly. Only an 'Original' mode now (One Fruit = One Point)


Catch as much fruit as possible to set a new high score in this fast paced arcade game. 

Drag the flying fruit into the matching basket as quickly as you can! Extra combo points are awarded for speed*, accuracy and use of multi-touch! BEWARE: drag the fruit into the wrong basket, and points are deducted!

Check the in game statistics page for an overview of your play style, check how many of each fruit you have caught as well as your average FPS (Fruits per second!).

More features are on the drawing board, and when they get released, the price may rise! 
For example an on-line leaderboard and statistics so you can show off your fruit catching skills to the world!

Fruit Catch was made for the Weekly App Hack. 

So stay tuned for more info at my blog here: www.wtsnz.com

*Combo points have been removed as of version 1.0.1.
